queryList.query: MATCH (n:User) WHERE n.hasspn=true RETURN n AS result ORDER BY n.name
match p=(u:User)-[:CanRDP]->(c:Computer) return p ORDER BY u.name
match p=(g:Group)-[:CanRDP]->(c:Computer) return p ORDER BY g.name

queries.name: List all CanRDP privileges for Users, Domain Users, Authenticated Users, or Everyone groups

queryList.query: match p=(g:Group)-[:CanRDP]->(c:Computer) WHERE (g.objectid =~ "(?i)S-1-5-21-.*-513" OR g.objectid =~ "(?i).*-S-1-5-11" OR g.objectid =~ "(?i).*-S-1-1-0" OR g.objectid =~ "(?i).*-S-1-5-32-545") return p ORDER BY g.name
MATCH (c:Computer {unconstraineddelegation:true}) RETURN c ORDER BY c.name

queries.name: List all computers with unsupported OSs

queryList.query: MATCH (H:Computer) WHERE H.operatingsystem =~ '.*(2000|2003|2008|xp|vista|7|me).*' RETURN H ORDER BY H.name
MATCH (g:Group) WHERE g.name =~ '.*((?i)admin|adm).*' RETURN g ORDER BY g.name
MATCH (u:User) WHERE u.name =~ '.*((?i)admin|adm).*' RETURN u ORDER BY u.name

queries.name: List all user shortest paths to admin groups

queryList.query: MATCH p=shortestPath((m:User)-[r*1..]->(n:Group)) WHERE n.name =~ ".*((?i)admin|adm).*" AND NONE (r IN relationships(p) WHERE type(r)= "GetChanges") AND NONE (r in relationships(p) WHERE type(r)="GetChangesAll") RETURN p ORDER BY m.name

queries.name: List all group shortest paths to admin groups

queryList.query: MATCH p=shortestPath((m:Group)-[r*1..]->(n:Group)) WHERE n.name =~ ".*((?i)admin|adm).*" AND NOT m=n AND NONE (r IN relationships(p) WHERE type(r)= "GetChanges") AND NONE (r in relationships(p) WHERE type(r)="GetChangesAll") RETURN p ORDER BY m.name

MATCH (n:Group) RETURN n ORDER BY n.name
MATCH (n:Computer) RETURN n ORDER BY n.name

MATCH (n:Computer {enabled:FALSE}) RETURN n ORDER BY n.name

queries.name: List all users that don't require a password

queryList.query: MATCH (n:User {passwordnotreqd:true}) return n ORDER BY n.name

queryList.query: MATCH (n:User {pwdneverexpires:true}) return n ORDER BY n.name
MATCH p=(u:User)-[:AllowedToDelegate]->(c:Computer) RETURN p ORDER BY u.name
MATCH p=(g:Group)-[:AllowedToDelegate]->(c:Computer) RETURN p ORDER BY g.name
MATCH p=(c1:Computer)-[:AllowedToDelegate]->(c2:Computer) RETURN p ORDER BY c1.name
Match (n:GPO) RETURN n ORDER BY n.name
Match (n:Domain) RETURN n ORDER BY n.name
MATCH p=(n:Domain)-[r:TrustedBy]->(m:Domain) RETURN p ORDER by n.name
Match (c:Computer) WHERE c.haslaps = true RETURN c ORDER BY c.name
Match (c:Computer) WHERE c.haslaps = false RETURN c ORDER BY c.name

queries.name: List users with potential passwords in descriptions

queryList.query: MATCH (u:User) WHERE u.description =~ '.*((?i)pass|pw|:).*' return u ORDER BY u.name

MATCH (m:User {sensitive:true}) RETURN m ORDER BY m.name

MATCH p=(n:Computer)-[r:CanPSRemote]->(m:Computer) RETURN p ORDER BY n.name

MATCH p=(n:Group)-[r:ExecuteDCOM]->(m:Computer) RETURN p ORDER BY n.name
MATCH p=(n:Computer)-[r:ExecuteDCOM]->(m:Computer) RETURN p ORDER BY n.name
MATCH p=(n:User)-[r:AllowedToAct]->(m) RETURN p ORDER BY n.name
MATCH p=(n:Group)-[r:AllowedToAct]->(m) RETURN p ORDER BY n.name
MATCH p=(n:Computer)-[r:AllowedToAct]->(m) RETURN p ORDER BY n.name
MATCH p=(n:User)-[r:Owns]->(m) RETURN p ORDER BY n.name
MATCH p=(n:Group)-[r:Owns]->(m) RETURN p ORDER BY n.name
MATCH p=(n:Computer)-[r:Owns]->(m) RETURN p ORDER BY n.name
MATCH p=(n:User)-[r:AllExtendedRights]->(m) RETURN p ORDER BY n.name
MATCH p=(n:Group)-[r:AllExtendedRights]->(m) RETURN p ORDER BY n.name
MATCH p=(n:Computer)-[r:AllExtendedRights]->(m) RETURN p ORDER BY n.name
MATCH p=(n:User)-[r:MemberOf]->(m) RETURN p ORDER BY n.name
MATCH p=(n:Group)-[r:MemberOf]->(m) RETURN p ORDER BY n.name
MATCH p=(n:Computer)-[r:MemberOf]->(m) RETURN p ORDER BY n.name
MATCH p=(n:User)-[r:AddKeyCredentialLink]->(m) RETURN p ORDER BY n.name
MATCH p=(n:Group)-[r:AddKeyCredentialLink]->(m) RETURN p ORDER BY n.name
MATCH p=(n:Computer)-[r:AddKeyCredentialLink]->(m) RETURN p ORDER BY n.name
MATCH p=(n:User)-[r:GenericAll]->(m) RETURN p ORDER BY n.name
MATCH p=(n:Group)-[r:GenericAll]->(m) RETURN p ORDER BY n.name
MATCH p=(n:Computer)-[r:GenericAll]->(m) RETURN p ORDER BY n.name
MATCH p=(n:User)-[r:WriteDacl]->(m) RETURN p ORDER BY n.name
MATCH p=(n:Group)-[r:WriteDacl]->(m) RETURN p ORDER BY n.name
MATCH p=(n:Computer)-[r:WriteDacl]->(m) RETURN p ORDER BY n.name
MATCH p=(n:User)-[r:WriteOwner]->(m) RETURN p ORDER BY n.name
MATCH p=(n:Group)-[r:WriteOwner]->(m) RETURN p ORDER BY n.name
MATCH p=(n:Computer)-[r:WriteOwner]->(m) RETURN p ORDER BY n.name
MATCH p=(n:User)-[r:GenericWrite]->(m) RETURN p ORDER BY n.name
MATCH p=(n:Group)-[r:GenericWrite]->(m) RETURN p ORDER BY n.name
MATCH p=(n:Computer)-[r:GenericWrite]->(m) RETURN p ORDER BY n.name
MATCH (o:OU) RETURN o ORDER BY o.name
MATCH (c:Container) RETURN c ORDER BY c.name
Match (n:Domain) RETURN n ORDER BY n.name

queries.name: List all object control over OUs

queryList.query: match p=(n)-[r:Owns|AllExtendedRights|WriteDacl|GenericAll|WriteOwner|GenericWrite]->(o:OU) return p ORDER BY n.name

queries.name: List all object control over Containers

queryList.query: match p=(n)-[r:Owns|AllExtendedRights|WriteDacl|GenericAll|WriteOwner|GenericWrite]->(c:Container) return p ORDER BY n.name

queries.name: List all object control over GPOs

queryList.query: match p=(n)-[r:Owns|AllExtendedRights|WriteDacl|GenericAll|WriteOwner|GenericWrite]->(g:GPO) return p ORDER BY n.name
MATCH p=(g1)-[:GPLink]->(g2) RETURN p ORDER BY g1.name
MATCH p=(n:User)-[r]->(m) RETURN p ORDER BY TYPE(r)
MATCH p=(n:Group)-[r]->(m) RETURN p ORDER BY TYPE(r)
MATCH p=(n:Computer)-[r]->(m) RETURN p ORDER BY TYPE(r)

queries.name: List all privileges for Users, Domain Users, Authenticated Users, or Everyone groups

queryList.query: MATCH p=(n:Group)-[r]->(m) WHERE (n.objectid =~ "(?i)S-1-5-21-.*-513" OR n.objectid =~ "(?i).*-S-1-5-11" OR n.objectid =~ "(?i).*-S-1-1-0" OR n.objectid =~ "(?i).*-S-1-5-32-545") RETURN p ORDER BY TYPE(r)

queryList.title: Select source user...
queryList.query: MATCH (u:User) RETURN u.name ORDER BY u.name
match p=(u:User {name: $result})-[:CanRDP]->(c:Computer) return p

queries.name: List this user's group-delegated RDP privileges

queryList.title: Select source user...
queryList.query: MATCH (u:User) RETURN u.name ORDER BY u.name
MATCH p=(n:User {name: $result})-[:MemberOf]->(m:Group),(m)-[:CanRDP]->(c:Computer) RETURN p ORDER BY m.name

queryList.title: Select source user...
queryList.query: MATCH (u:User) RETURN u.name ORDER BY u.name
MATCH p=(m:User {name: $result})-[r:AdminTo]->(n:Computer) RETURN p ORDER BY m.name

MATCH p=(n:User {name: $result})-[r:ReadLAPSPassword]->(m:Computer) RETURN p ORDER by n.name

queries.name: List if this user's AS-REP roastable

queryList.title: Select source user...
queryList.query: MATCH (u:User) RETURN u.name ORDER BY u.name
MATCH (u:User {dontreqpreauth: true, name: $result}) RETURN u

queryList.title: Select source user...
queryList.query: MATCH (u:User) RETURN u.name ORDER BY u.name
MATCH (n:User {name: $result, hasspn: true}) RETURN n AS result ORDER BY n.name

queries.name: List all privileges for this user

queryList.title: Select source user...
queryList.query: MATCH (u:User) RETURN u.name ORDER BY u.name
MATCH p=(n:User {name: $result})-[r]->(m) RETURN p ORDER BY TYPE(r)

queries.name: List all group-delegated privileges for this user

queryList.title: Select source user...
queryList.query: MATCH (u:User) RETURN u.name ORDER BY u.name
MATCH p=(n:User {name: $result})-[:MemberOf]->(m:Group),(m)-[r]->(v) RETURN p ORDER BY m.name

queries.name: List all shortest paths to high-value targets for this user

queryList.title: Select source user...
queryList.query: MATCH (u:User) RETURN u.name ORDER BY u.name

MATCH (m:User {name: $result}),(n {highvalue:true}),p=shortestPath((m)-[r*1..]->(n)) WHERE NONE (r IN relationships(p) WHERE type(r)= "GetChanges") AND NONE (r in relationships(p) WHERE type(r)="GetChangesAll") AND NOT m=n return p ORDER BY m.name

queries.name: List all shortest paths to Domain Admins for this user

queryList.title: Select source user...
queryList.query: MATCH (u:User) RETURN u.name ORDER BY u.name

MATCH p=shortestPath((m:User {name: $result})-[r*1..]->(n:Group)) WHERE n.objectid =~ "(?i)S-1-5-21-.*-512" AND NONE (r IN relationships(p) WHERE type(r)= "GetChanges") AND NONE (r in relationships(p) WHERE type(r)="GetChangesAll") return p ORDER BY m.name

queries.name: List all shortest paths to Enterprise Admins for this user

queryList.title: Select source user...
queryList.query: MATCH (u:User) RETURN u.name ORDER BY u.name

MATCH p=shortestPath((m:User {name: $result})-[r*1..]->(n:Group)) WHERE n.objectid =~ "(?i)S-1-5-21-.*-519" AND NONE (r IN relationships(p) WHERE type(r)= "GetChanges") AND NONE (r in relationships(p) WHERE type(r)="GetChangesAll") return p ORDER BY m.name

MATCH p=shortestPath((m:User {name: $result})-[r*1..]->(n:Group)) WHERE n.name =~ ".*((?i)EXCHANGE).*" AND NONE (r IN relationships(p) WHERE type(r)= "GetChanges") AND NONE (r in relationships(p) WHERE type(r)="GetChangesAll") RETURN p ORDER BY m.name

queries.name: List all privileges for this group

queryList.title: Select source group...
queryList.query: MATCH (g:Group) RETURN g.name ORDER BY g.name

MATCH p=(n:Group {name: $result})-[r:AdminTo|HasSession|ForceChangePassword|AddMember|AddSelf|CanPSRemote|ExecuteDCOM|SQLAdmin|AllowedToDelegate|GenericAll|GenericWrite|WriteDacl|Owns|AddKeyCredentialLink|ReadLAPSPassword|SyncLAPSPassword|ReadGMSAPassword|AllExtendedRights|AllowedToAct]->(m) RETURN p ORDER BY TYPE(r)

queries.name: List all shortest paths to high-value targets for this group

queryList.title: Select source group...
queryList.query: MATCH (g:Group) RETURN g.name ORDER BY g.name

MATCH (m:Group {name: $result}),(n {highvalue:true}),p=shortestPath((m)-[r*1..]->(n)) WHERE NONE (r IN relationships(p) WHERE type(r)= "GetChanges") AND NONE (r in relationships(p) WHERE type(r)="GetChangesAll") AND NOT m=n return p ORDER BY m.name

queryList.title: Select source group...
queryList.query: MATCH (g:Group) RETURN g.name ORDER BY g.name

MATCH p=shortestPath((m)-[r*1..]->(n:Group {name: $result})) WHERE NOT m=n AND NONE (r IN relationships(p) WHERE type(r)= "GetChanges") AND NONE (r in relationships(p) WHERE type(r)="GetChangesAll") RETURN p ORDER BY m.name

queryList.title: Select source computer...
queryList.query: MATCH (c:Computer) RETURN c.name ORDER BY c.name
MATCH p=(m:Computer {name: $result})-[r:AdminTo]->(n:Computer) RETURN p ORDER BY m.name

queries.name: List this computer's group-delegated AdminTo privileges

queryList.title: Select source computer...
queryList.query: MATCH (c:Computer) RETURN c.name ORDER BY c.name
MATCH p=(n:Computer {name: $result})-[:MemberOf]->(m:Group),(m)-[:AdminTo]->(c:Computer) RETURN p ORDER BY m.name

queryList.title: Select source computer...
queryList.query: MATCH (c:Computer) RETURN c.name ORDER BY c.name
MATCH p=(n:Computer {name: $result})-[r:ReadLAPSPassword]->(m:Computer) RETURN p ORDER by n.name

queryList.title: Select source computer...
queryList.query: MATCH (c:Computer) RETURN c.name ORDER BY c.name
MATCH p=(n:Computer {name: $result})-[r:SyncLAPSPassword]->(m:Computer) RETURN p ORDER by n.name

queryList.title: Select source computer...
queryList.query: MATCH (c:Computer) RETURN c.name ORDER BY c.name
MATCH p=(n:Computer {name: $result})-[r:ReadGMSAPassword]->(m:User) RETURN p ORDER by n.name

queries.name: List this computer's Constrained Delegation privileges

queryList.title: Select source computer...
queryList.query: MATCH (c:Computer) RETURN c.name ORDER BY c.name
MATCH p=(n:Computer {name: $result})-[:AllowedToDelegate]->(c:Computer) RETURN p

queryList.title: Select source computer...
queryList.query: MATCH (c:Computer) RETURN c.name ORDER BY c.name
MATCH p=(n:Computer {name: $result})-[r:ForceChangePassword]->(m:User) RETURN p ORDER BY n.name

queryList.title: Select source computer...
queryList.query: MATCH (c:Computer) RETURN c.name ORDER BY c.name
MATCH p=(n:Computer {name: $result})-[r:AddMember]->(m:Group) RETURN p ORDER BY n.name

queryList.title: Select source computer...
queryList.query: MATCH (c:Computer) RETURN c.name ORDER BY c.name
MATCH p=(n:Computer {name: $result})-[r:AddSelf]->(m:Group) RETURN p ORDER BY n.name

queryList.title: Select source computer...
queryList.query: MATCH (c:Computer) RETURN c.name ORDER BY c.name
MATCH p=(n:Computer {name: $result})-[r:SQLAdmin]->(m:Computer) RETURN p ORDER BY n.name

queryList.title: Select source computer...
queryList.query: MATCH (c:Computer) RETURN c.name ORDER BY c.name
MATCH p=(n:Computer {name: $result})-[r:CanPSRemote]->(m:Computer) RETURN p ORDER BY n.name

queryList.title: Select source computer...
queryList.query: MATCH (c:Computer) RETURN c.name ORDER BY c.name
MATCH p=(n:Computer {name: $result})-[r:ExecuteDCOM]->(m:Computer) RETURN p ORDER BY n.name

queryList.title: Select source computer...
queryList.query: MATCH (c:Computer) RETURN c.name ORDER BY c.name
MATCH p=(n:Computer {name: $result})-[r:AllowedToAct]->(m) RETURN p ORDER BY n.name

queryList.title: Select source computer...
queryList.query: MATCH (c:Computer) RETURN c.name ORDER BY c.name
MATCH p=(n:Computer {name: $result})-[r:Owns]->(m) RETURN p ORDER BY n.name

queryList.title: Select source computer...
queryList.query: MATCH (c:Computer) RETURN c.name ORDER BY c.name
MATCH p=(n:Computer {name: $result})-[r:AllExtendedRights]->(m) RETURN p ORDER BY n.name

queryList.title: Select source computer...
queryList.query: MATCH (c:Computer) RETURN c.name ORDER BY c.name
MATCH p=(n:Computer {name: $result})-[r:AddKeyCredentialLink]->(m) RETURN p ORDER BY n.name

queryList.title: Select source computer...
queryList.query: MATCH (c:Computer) RETURN c.name ORDER BY c.name
MATCH p=(n:Computer {name: $result})-[r:GenericAll]->(m) RETURN p ORDER BY n.name

queryList.title: Select source computer...
queryList.query: MATCH (c:Computer) RETURN c.name ORDER BY c.name
MATCH p=(n:Computer {name: $result})-[r:WriteDacl]->(m) RETURN p ORDER BY n.name

queryList.title: Select source computer...
queryList.query: MATCH (c:Computer) RETURN c.name ORDER BY c.name
MATCH p=(n:Computer {name: $result})-[r:WriteOwner]->(m) RETURN p ORDER BY n.name

queryList.title: Select source computer...
queryList.query: MATCH (c:Computer) RETURN c.name ORDER BY c.name
MATCH p=(n:Computer {name: $result})-[r:GenericWrite]->(m) RETURN p ORDER BY n.name

queryList.title: Select source computer...
queryList.query: MATCH (c:Computer) RETURN c.name ORDER BY c.name
MATCH p=(n:Computer {name: $result})-[r:MemberOf]->(m) RETURN p ORDER BY n.name

queries.name: List all privileges for this computer

queryList.title: Select source computer...
queryList.query: MATCH (c:Computer) RETURN c.name ORDER BY c.name
MATCH p=(n:Computer {name: $result})-[r]->(m) RETURN p ORDER BY TYPE(r)

queries.name: List all group-delegated privileges for this computer

queryList.title: Select source computer...
queryList.query: MATCH (c:Computer) RETURN c.name ORDER BY c.name
MATCH p=(n:Computer {name: $result})-[:MemberOf]->(m:Group),(m)-[r]->(v) RETURN p ORDER BY m.name

queries.name: List all shortest paths to high-value targets for this computer

queryList.title: Select source computer...
queryList.query: MATCH (c:Computer) RETURN c.name ORDER BY c.name

MATCH (m:Computer {name: $result}),(n {highvalue:true}),p=shortestPath((m)-[r*1..]->(n)) WHERE NONE (r IN relationships(p) WHERE type(r)= "GetChanges") AND NONE (r in relationships(p) WHERE type(r)="GetChangesAll") AND NOT m=n return p ORDER BY m.name

queries.name: List all shortest paths to Domain Admins for this computer

queryList.title: Select source computer...
queryList.query: MATCH (c:Computer) RETURN c.name ORDER BY c.name

MATCH p=shortestPath((m:Computer {name: $result})-[r*1..]->(n:Group)) WHERE n.objectid =~ "(?i)S-1-5-21-.*-512" AND NONE (r IN relationships(p) WHERE type(r)= "GetChanges") AND NONE (r in relationships(p) WHERE type(r)="GetChangesAll") return p ORDER BY m.name

queries.name: List all shortest paths to Enterprise Admins for this computer

queryList.title: Select source computer...
queryList.query: MATCH (c:Computer) RETURN c.name ORDER BY c.name

MATCH p=shortestPath((m:Computer {name: $result})-[r*1..]->(n:Group)) WHERE n.objectid =~ "(?i)S-1-5-21-.*-519" AND NONE (r IN relationships(p) WHERE type(r)= "GetChanges") AND NONE (r in relationships(p) WHERE type(r)="GetChangesAll") return p ORDER BY m.name

queries.name: List all shortest paths to Domain Controllers for this computer

queryList.title: Select source computer...
queryList.query: MATCH (c:Computer) RETURN c.name ORDER BY c.name

MATCH p=shortestPath((m:Computer {name: $result})-[r*1..]->(n:Group)) WHERE n.objectid =~ "(?i)S-1-5-21-.*-516" AND NONE (r IN relationships(p) WHERE type(r)= "GetChanges") AND NONE (r in relationships(p) WHERE type(r)="GetChangesAll") return p ORDER BY m.name

queries.name: List all shortest paths to Exchange groups for this computer

queryList.title: Select source computer...
queryList.query: MATCH (c:Computer) RETURN c.name ORDER BY c.name

MATCH p=shortestPath((m:Computer {name: $result})-[r*1..]->(n:Group)) WHERE n.name =~ ".*((?i)EXCHANGE).*" AND NONE (r IN relationships(p) WHERE type(r)= "GetChanges") AND NONE (r in relationships(p) WHERE type(r)="GetChangesAll") RETURN p ORDER BY m.name

MATCH p=shortestPath((m:Computer {name: $result})-[r*1..]->(n:Group)) WHERE n.name =~ ".*((?i)admin|adm).*" AND NONE (r IN relationships(p) WHERE type(r)= "GetChanges") AND NONE (r in relationships(p) WHERE type(r)="GetChangesAll") RETURN p ORDER BY m.name

queries.name: List all shortest paths to this computer

queryList.title: Select source computer...
queryList.query: MATCH (c:Computer) RETURN c.name ORDER BY c.name

MATCH p=shortestPath((m)-[r*1..]->(n:Computer {name: $result})) WHERE NOT m=n AND NONE (r IN relationships(p) WHERE type(r)= "GetChanges") AND NONE (r in relationships(p) WHERE type(r)="GetChangesAll") RETURN p ORDER BY m.name
